00012 // - Removed 'vp' preffix of every method name.

00015 //   in VPJoint and VPDof.

00069 void VPPolyaxialJoint::SetFlexionTo(float value) {
00070     VPDof* ptrFirstDof = dofList.front();
00071     ptrFirstDof->MoveTo(value);
00072 }
00073 
00074 void VPPolyaxialJoint::SetAductionTo(float value) {
00075     list<VPDof*>::iterator iter = dofList.begin();
00076     ++iter;
00077     VPDof* ptrSecondDof = *iter;
00078     ptrSecondDof->MoveTo(value);
00079 }
00080 
00081 void VPPolyaxialJoint::SetTwistTo(float value) {
00082     list<VPDof*>::iterator iter = dofList.begin();
00083     ++iter;
00084     ++iter;
00085     VPDof* ptrThirdDof = *iter;
00086     ptrThirdDof->MoveTo(value);
00087 }
00088 
00089 void VPPolyaxialJoint::AddDof(VPDof* dof) {
00090     assert (GetNumDofs() < 3);
00091     VPJoint::AddDof(dof);
00092     // If the third DOF was added, the joint should be made ready for use.
00093     if (GetNumDofs() == 3) MakeLim();
00094 }
